name: Google Event Tracker - CKEditor Plugin
short_description:
This is a plugin for the CKEditor. It is to assign 
 anchor tags the onclick='_gaq.push' code to the tag 
 and allow the user to input the information easily. 
 
 This plugin requires the google analytics to be pre-
 installed on the page. There is no check for the code 
 to be present, as it should be typically installed in 
 the header or footer. 

 This has been tested on CKEditor 3.x, enjoy!

Installation:

 - Ensure that Google Analytics is intstalled on the 
	site
 - Drop the folder "googletracker" into the plugins 
	directory of ckeditor.
 - Modify the config.js to include the plugin + add it 
	to the toolbar. Refer to EXAMPLE_CONFIG.js**

 ** NOTE: this may differ for various CMS, check the 
	appropriate documentation for the CMS if button
	is not showing.
summary: Google Event Tracking plugin for CKEditor
